name: CatholicPrayers(Italian)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers italian”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers italian to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers italian to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers italian
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The skill content, for the prayers, is in Italian.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

List of Prayers:

Il segno della croce (The Sign of the Cross in Italian)
Nostro Padre/La preghiera del Signore (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in Italian)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in Italian)
Gloria Essere (Glory Be in Italian)
Il Credo dell'apostolo (The Apostle's Creed in Italian)
Ave, Regina Santa (Hail Holy Queen in Italian)
Anima Christi (in Italian)
Memorare (in Italian)
L'Angelus (The Angelus in Italian)
Preghiera di San Michele (Saint Michael Prayer in Italian)
